recipes.title: Creamy Broccoli Soup
recipes.summary: A comforting broccoli soup blended with cream and spices.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add broccoli and broth; simmer until tender.
Blend until smooth and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Strawberry Spinach Salad
recipes.summary: Fresh spinach salad with strawberries and a tangy vinaigrette.
steps: Toss spinach and strawberries in a bowl.
Sprinkle almonds on top.
Drizzle with vinaigrette and serve.

recipes.title: Roasted Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.summary: A classic tomato soup enhanced with roasted tomatoes and fresh basil.
steps: Roast tomatoes with garlic and onion until caramelized.
Blend roasted vegetables with broth.
Simmer and add fresh basil before serving.

recipes.title: Chickpea and Avocado Salad
recipes.summary: A protein-rich salad with chickpeas, avocado, and fresh herbs.
steps: Combine chickpeas, avocado, onion, and parsley.
Drizzle with lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing and croutons.
steps: Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.summary: A classic chicken noodle soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.
steps: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add egg noodles and cook until tender.
Stir in cooked chicken and season to taste.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.summary: A fresh salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil dressing.
steps: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta, and onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
recipes.summary: A smooth, creamy soup made with roasted butternut squash and aromatic spices.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add roasted squash and vegetable broth.
Simmer and blend until smooth.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Spinach and Strawberry Smoothie
recipes.summary: A refreshing smoothie with spinach, strawberries, and almond milk.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.summary: Simple and delicious avocado spread over toasted bread.
steps: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread on toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

recipes.title: Blueberry Oatmeal
recipes.summary: Hearty oatmeal topped with fresh blueberries and a drizzle of honey.
steps: Cook oats with water or milk according to package directions.
Top with blueberries, honey, and cinnamon.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.summary: A fluffy omelette filled with mixed vegetables and cheese.
steps: Whisk eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Cook vegetables in a skillet until softened.
Add eggs and cook until set.
Sprinkle with cheese before folding.

recipes.title: Berry Yogurt Parfait
recipes.summary: Layers of Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and granola.
steps: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Breast
recipes.summary: Juicy grilled chicken breasts seasoned with herbs and spices.
steps: Brush chicken breasts with olive oil.
Season with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill over medium heat until cooked through.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.summary: A hearty chili with beans, tomatoes, and spices.
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper until softened.
Add beans, tomatoes, and spices.
Simmer for at least 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Lemon
recipes.summary: Tender salmon fillets baked with lemon slices and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet.
Top with lemon slices and herbs.
Drizzle with olive oil and season.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.summary: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, ground beef, and spices.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Brown meat with onion, then stir in rice, tomatoes, and seasoning.
Stuff peppers and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.note: Recipe 18 — Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
recipes.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
recipes.summary: A nutritious bowl of quinoa, black beans, vegetables, and avocado.
steps: Combine quinoa, beans, corn, and bell pepper in a bowl.
Top with avocado and cilantro.
Drizzle with lime juice before serving.

recipes.title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
recipes.summary: Crispy roasted potatoes seasoned with garlic and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 25-30 minutes until golden and crispy.

recipes.title: Steamed Asparagus
recipes.summary: Tender steamed asparagus seasoned simply with lemon and salt.
steps: Trim asparagus ends.
Steam until tender-crisp, about 4-5 minutes.
Season with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Brown Rice Pilaf
recipes.summary: Nutty brown rice cooked with vegetables and broth.
steps: Sauté onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add rice and broth; bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.note: Recipe 22 — Sautéed Green Beans with Almonds
recipes.title: Sautéed Green Beans with Almonds
recipes.summary: Green beans sautéed with garlic and topped with toasted almonds.
steps: Sauté green beans in olive oil until tender-crisp.
Add garlic and cook 1 minute.
Top with toasted almonds and season.

recipes.note: Recipe 23 — Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
recipes.title: Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
recipes.summary: A refreshing mix of fresh fruits tossed in a honey-lime dressing.
steps: Combine fruits in a large bowl.
Mix lime juice and honey; drizzle over fruit.
Toss gently and chill before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.summary: Fluffy classic pancakes perfect for a hearty breakfast.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until smooth.
Cook pancakes on a greased griddle until golden brown.

recipes.title: Spinach and Mushroom Frittata
recipes.summary: A baked frittata packed with spinach, mushrooms, and cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté mushrooms and spinach until wilted.
Beat eggs with cheese, salt, and pepper.
Combine with vegetables and bake until set.

recipes.title: Mango Smoothie
recipes.summary: A tropical smoothie with mango, banana, and orange juice.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.note: Recipe 27 — Iced Green Tea with Mint
recipes.title: Iced Green Tea with Mint
recipes.summary: Refreshing iced green tea infused with fresh mint leaves.
steps: Brew green tea and chill.
Add mint leaves and honey if desired.
Serve over ice.

recipes.title: Lemonade
recipes.summary: Classic lemonade made with fresh lemons and sugar.
steps: Mix lemon juice and sugar until dissolved.
Add water and stir.
Serve over ice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.summary: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Combine dry ingredients.
Beat butter, sugars, eggs, and vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients and chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls and bake for 9-11 minutes.

recipes.title: Vanilla Cupcakes
recipes.summary: Soft vanilla cupcakes with buttercream frosting.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients.
Cream butter and sugar, then add eggs and vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients and milk.
Pour into cupcake liners and bake for 18-20 minutes.

recipes.title: Apple Crisp
recipes.summary: Warm baked apples topped with a crunchy oat topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Toss apples with sugar and cinnamon; place in baking dish.
Mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and butter until crumbly.
Sprinkle over apples and bake for 40-45 minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Mousse
recipes.summary: Rich and creamy chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream.
steps: Melt chocolate and let cool slightly.
Beat egg yolks with sugar and vanilla.
Fold in melted chocolate.
Whip cream and fold in.
Beat egg whites until stiff and fold in gently.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Fruit Tart
recipes.summary: A crisp tart shell filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh fruit.
steps: Fill tart shell with pastry cream.
Arrange fresh fruit on top.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Brownies
recipes.summary: Fudgy chocolate brownies with a rich cocoa flavor.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Stir in cocoa, flour, salt, and baking powder.
Pour into a greased pan and bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Fruit Popsicles
recipes.summary: Simple homemade fruit popsicles made with blended fruit.
steps: Blend fruit with juice or water and honey if using.
Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until solid.

recipes.title: Peach Cobbler
recipes.summary: Sweet peaches baked with a fluffy biscuit topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place peaches in a baking dish and sprinkle with sugar.
Mix flour, baking powder, salt, milk, and butter.
Drop batter over peaches and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
recipes.summary: A creamy smoothie with mixed fruit and yogurt.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Herb Roasted Chicken
recipes.summary: Whole chicken roasted with fresh herbs and garlic.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Rub chicken with olive oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes or until cooked through.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Banana Bread
recipes.summary: Moist banana bread made with gluten-free flour.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix bananas, butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt.
Pour into loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipes.summary: Seasonal vegetables roasted to perfection.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss vegetables with olive oil and seasoning.
Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Classic Hummus
recipes.summary: Creamy hummus made with chickpeas, tahini, and lemon.
steps: Blend all ingredients in a food processor until smooth.

recipes.title: Deviled Eggs
recipes.summary: Classic deviled eggs with a creamy mustard filling.
steps: Slice eggs in half and remove yolks.
Mash yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spoon filling into egg whites and garnish with paprika.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.summary: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.summary: Quinoa salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta.
steps: Combine quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipes.summary: Grilled chicken, romaine, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.
steps: Lay out tortillas.
Top with lettuce, chicken, dressing, and Parmesan.
Wrap tightly and slice in half.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.summary: Classic pasta with garlic, olive oil, and parsley.
steps: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until golden.
Add red pepper flakes.
Toss cooked spaghetti with the garlic oil and parsley.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.summary: Hearty lentil soup with vegetables and spices.
steps: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add lentils, broth, and cumin.
Simmer until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Avocado Black Bean Tacos
recipes.summary: Corn tortillas filled with black beans, avocado, and fresh salsa.
steps: Warm tortillas.
Fill with black beans, avocado, and salsa.
Top with cilantro.

recipes.title: Cucumber Dill Yogurt Dip
recipes.summary: A creamy dip with cucumber, dill, and Greek yogurt.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Mix well and chill before serving.

recipes.title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
recipes.summary: Cubed sweet potatoes roasted with olive oil and spices.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss sweet potatoes with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 25-30 minutes until tender and caramelized.

recipes.title: Garlic Bread
recipes.summary: Crispy garlic bread with parsley butter.
steps: Mix butter, garlic, and parsley.
Spread on bread slices.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10 minutes or until golden.

recipes.title: Tomato Bruschetta
recipes.summary: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.
steps: Toast baguette slices.
Mix tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil, salt, and pepper.
Top bread with tomato mixture.

recipes.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
recipes.summary: Creamy dip with spinach, artichokes, and cheese.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Transfer to a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes or until bubbly.

recipes.title: Classic Meatloaf
recipes.summary: Traditional meatloaf with a tangy tomato glaze.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix all ingredients except ketchup.
Shape into a loaf in a baking dish.
Spread ketchup on top.
Bake for 1 hour or until cooked through.

recipes.title: Grilled Veggie Skewers
recipes.summary: Assorted vegetables grilled on skewers.
steps: Thread vegetables onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil and season.
Grill over medium heat until tender.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti
recipes.summary: Pasta baked with marinara sauce and cheese.
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Mix with marinara and ricotta.
Transfer to a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella and Parmesan.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipes.summary: Crispy roasted Brussels sprouts with olive oil and seasoning.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

recipes.title: Egg Salad Sandwich
recipes.summary: Creamy egg salad served on whole grain bread.
steps: Mix eggs with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spread egg salad on bread slices.
Add lettuce and top with remaining bread.

recipes.title: Fresh Fruit Smoothie
recipes.summary: A simple smoothie with seasonal fresh fruits.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
recipes.summary: Soft and chewy oatmeal cookies with raisins.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugars, then beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and cinnamon.
Stir in oats and raisins.
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheets and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.summary: Quick stir fry with chicken and mixed vegetables.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a wok or skillet.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add garlic, ginger, and vegetables.
Stir fry until vegetables are tender.
Add soy sauce and stir to combine.

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
recipes.summary: Chicken salad made with Greek yogurt instead of mayo.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Mix until well blended.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
recipes.summary: Creamy mashed potatoes with roasted garlic.
steps: Roast garlic at 400°F (200°C) for 30 minutes.
Boil potatoes until tender.
Mash potatoes with roasted garlic, milk, butter, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.summary: Spicy chickpea curry with coconut milk and tomatoes.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add curry powder and stir until fragrant.
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, and coconut milk.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Cucumber Tomato Salad
recipes.summary: Simple salad with cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
steps: Combine cucumber, tomato, and onion in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Sweet Cornbread
recipes.summary: Moist and sweet cornbread perfect as a side dish.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix dry ingredients.
Add milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Pour into greased pan and bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Turkey and Cheese Sandwich
recipes.summary: Classic turkey and cheese sandwich with lettuce and tomato.
steps: Spread mayonnaise or mustard on bread slices.
Layer turkey, cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
Top with remaining bread slices.

recipes.title: Simple Garden Salad
recipes.summary: Mixed greens with fresh vegetables and vinaigrette.
steps: Combine greens and vegetables in a bowl.
Drizzle with vinaigrette and toss gently.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.summary: Classic grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheddar.
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between two slices, buttered sides out.
Cook in skillet until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.title: Berry Spinach Smoothie
recipes.summary: Healthy smoothie with berries and spinach.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Roasted Carrots with Honey
recipes.summary: Tender roasted carrots glazed with honey.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss carrots with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 20-25 minutes.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipes.summary: Simple tuna salad with celery and mayonnaise.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Fresh Lemon Vinaigrette
recipes.summary: Light and tangy salad dressing.
steps: Whisk together all ingredients.

recipes.title: Spaghetti with Marinara
recipes.summary: Spaghetti topped with classic marinara sauce.
steps: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Heat marinara sauce and pour over spaghetti.
Top with Parmesan cheese if desired.

recipes.title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
recipes.summary: Fresh strawberries dipped in melted chocolate.
steps: Melt chocolate in a microwave or double boiler.
Dip strawberries into chocolate.
Place on parchment paper and chill until set.

recipes.title: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
recipes.summary: A protein-packed breakfast bowl with quinoa, berries, and nuts.
steps: Spoon quinoa into a bowl.
Top with berries, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.
Add Greek yogurt if desired.

recipes.title: Veggie Quesadilla
recipes.summary: A cheesy quesadilla filled with sautéed vegetables.
steps: Sauté vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Place vegetables and cheese between tortillas.
Cook on a skillet until tortillas are golden and cheese melts.

recipes.title: Almond Butter Banana Toast
recipes.summary: Whole grain toast topped with almond butter and banana slices.
steps: Toast the bread slices.
Spread almond butter on toast.
Top with banana slices.

recipes.title: Baked Sweet Potato Fries
recipes.summary: Crispy baked sweet potato fries seasoned with paprika.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, cut into fries
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss fries with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway.

recipes.title: Honey Mustard Dressing
recipes.summary: A quick homemade dressing with honey, mustard, and vinegar.
steps: Whisk together all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Squash with Marinara
recipes.summary: Roasted spaghetti squash topped with marinara sauce and Parmesan.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cut squash in half and roast cut-side down for 40 minutes.
Scrape out strands and top with marinara and Parmesan.

recipes.title: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
recipes.summary: Creamy hummus blended with roasted red peppers.
steps: Blend all ingredients in a food processor until smooth.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.summary: Sautéed chicken strips with bell peppers and onions, served with tortillas.
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet.
Cook chicken until browned, add peppers and onions.
Stir in fajita seasoning and cook until vegetables are tender.
Serve with tortillas.

recipes.title: Avocado Egg Salad
recipes.summary: Egg salad mixed with creamy avocado and seasonings.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Serve on bread, lettuce leaves, or crackers.

recipes.title: Broccoli Cheddar Bites
recipes.summary: Mini baked bites filled with broccoli and cheddar cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix all ingredients together.
Shape into small balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Berry Chia Pudding
recipes.summary: Overnight chia pudding topped with fresh berries.
steps: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, and maple syrup in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Top with berries before serving.

recipes.title: Balsamic Roasted Vegetables
recipes.summary: Seasonal vegetables roasted with balsamic glaze.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, onions)
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss vegetables with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad Lettuce Wraps
recipes.summary: Chicken salad served in crisp lettuce leaves.
steps: Mix chicken, mayonnaise, celery, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Scoop into lettuce leaves and serve.

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.summary: Pasta with a medley of sautéed spring vegetables.
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté vegetables and garlic in olive oil.
Toss vegetables with pasta.
Top with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Fresh Fruit Salad
recipes.summary: A colorful mix of fresh seasonal fruits.
steps: Combine all fruits in a large bowl.
Drizzle with lime juice and toss gently.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.summary: Crisp romaine tossed with Caesar dressing, grilled chicken, and Parmesan.
steps: Toss lettuce with dressing.
Top with sliced chicken, Parmesan, and croutons.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.summary: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread sauce over dough.
Add mozzarella and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Top with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.title: Greek Chicken Souvlaki
recipes.summary: Grilled chicken skewers marinated in lemon and herbs.
steps: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lemon, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Thread onto skewers.
Grill until cooked through.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Omelette
recipes.summary: Fluffy omelette filled with spinach and crumbled feta.
steps: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté spinach in butter.
Pour eggs over spinach, cook until set.
Sprinkle with feta before folding.

recipes.title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
recipes.summary: Classic smoothie with strawberries, banana, and yogurt.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Roasted Cauliflower
recipes.summary: Cauliflower florets roasted with olive oil and spices.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss cauliflower with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 25-30 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
recipes.summary: Toasted bread topped with tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.
steps: Mix tomatoes, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spoon mixture onto toasted bread slices.

recipes.title: Baked Tilapia
recipes.summary: Tender baked tilapia seasoned with lemon and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place tilapia on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with garlic powder, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes.

recipes.title: Veggie Pasta Salad
recipes.summary: Chilled pasta salad with fresh vegetables and Italian dressing.
steps: Cook pasta, drain and cool.
Mix with vegetables and dressing.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chocolate Banana Overnight Oats
recipes.summary: Overnight oats flavored with cocoa and ripe bananas.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Stir before serving.

recipes.title: Turkey Chili
recipes.summary: Hearty chili made with ground turkey, beans, and spices.
steps: Brown turkey with onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes, beans, and spices.
Simmer for at least 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Cucumber Mint Water
recipes.summary: Refreshing infused water with cucumber and mint.
steps: Combine cucumber and mint in a pitcher with water.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Banana Nut Muffins
recipes.summary: Moist muffins with bananas and chopped walnuts.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix bananas, sugar, butter, and egg.
Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in walnuts.
Divide into muffin tins and bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Classic Deviled Eggs
recipes.summary: Hard-boiled eggs with a creamy mustard filling.
steps: Halve eggs and remove yolks.
Mash yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spoon or pipe filling into egg whites.
Sprinkle with paprika.

recipes.title: Shrimp Tacos with Slaw
recipes.summary: Seasoned shrimp served in tortillas with a crunchy slaw.
steps: Season shrimp with taco seasoning and cook until pink.
Mix cabbage with lime juice, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper for slaw.
Assemble tacos with shrimp and slaw.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Couscous Salad
recipes.summary: Couscous salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, feta, and lemon dressing.
steps: Combine couscous, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Baked Chicken Parmesan
recipes.summary: Breaded chicken breasts baked with marinara sauce and mozzarella.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Coat chicken in egg, then breadcrumb and Parmesan mixture.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Top with marinara and mozzarella and bake 10 more minutes.

recipes.title: Mango Salsa
recipes.summary: Fresh salsa made with mango, red onion, cilantro, and lime.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Serve with chips or as a topping for meat or fish.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.summary: Colorful vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, snap peas)
steps: Heat sesame oil in a skillet.
Add garlic and ginger.
Stir fry vegetables until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.

recipes.title: Blueberry Pancakes
recipes.summary: Fluffy pancakes filled with fresh blueberries.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in egg, milk, and melted butter.
Fold in blueberries.
Cook on a griddle until golden on both sides.

recipes.title: Chicken Vegetable Soup
recipes.summary: Light chicken soup with mixed vegetables.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a large pot.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Tuna Pasta Salad
recipes.summary: Cold pasta salad with tuna, peas, and creamy dressing.
steps: Cook pasta and cool.
Mix pasta with tuna, peas, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
recipes.summary: Light zucchini noodles tossed with basil pesto.
steps: Sauté zucchini noodles lightly in a skillet.
Toss with pesto and Parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Green Smoothie
recipes.summary: Healthy smoothie with spinach, banana, and almond milk.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.summary: Stir-fried chicken and vegetables with teriyaki sauce.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a skillet.
Cook chicken until browned.
Add vegetables and garlic.
Stir in teriyaki sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

recipes.title: Peach Yogurt Parfait
recipes.summary: Layers of Greek yogurt, peaches, and granola.
steps: Layer yogurt, peaches, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey.

recipes.title: Garlic Lemon Roasted Broccoli
recipes.summary: Roasted broccoli with garlic and lemon zest.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss broccoli with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 20 minutes.
Sprinkle with lemon zest before serving.

recipes.title: Turkey Wrap
recipes.summary: Simple turkey wrap with lettuce and tomato.
steps: Spread mayonnaise or mustard on the tortilla.
Layer turkey, lettuce, and tomato.
Roll up and slice.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
recipes.summary: Quick sautéed shrimp with lemon and garlic.
steps: Melt butter in a skillet.
Add garlic and cook briefly.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Drizzle with lemon juice and season.

recipes.title: Avocado Tomato Salad
recipes.summary: Fresh salad with avocado, tomato, and a lime vinaigrette.
steps: Combine avocado and tomato in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad Sandwich
recipes.summary: Classic chicken salad served on whole grain bread.
steps: Mix chicken, mayonnaise, celery, salt, and pepper.
Spread on bread slices with lettuce.

recipes.title: Veggie and Hummus Wrap
recipes.summary: Whole wheat wrap filled with hummus and fresh veggies.
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed sliced veggies (bell peppers, cucumber, spinach)
steps: Spread hummus on tortilla.
Add veggies, season, and roll up.

recipes.note: Recipe 123 — Egg and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
recipes.title: Egg and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
recipes.summary: Scrambled egg and cheese on an English muffin.
steps: Scramble egg with salt and pepper.
Place egg and cheese between muffin halves.

recipes.title: Simple Fruit Salad
recipes.summary: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits.
steps: Combine all fruits in a bowl.
Drizzle with orange juice.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.summary: Grilled chicken breast over mixed greens with vinaigrette.
steps: Arrange greens, tomatoes, and cucumbers on a plate.
Top with sliced chicken.
Drizzle with vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Black Bean Burrito Bowl
recipes.summary: Rice bowl with black beans, veggies, and avocado.
steps: Layer rice, beans, corn, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Top with avocado and cilantro.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Hash
recipes.summary: Diced sweet potatoes sautéed with onions and bell peppers.
steps: Heat oil in a skillet.
Cook sweet potatoes until tender.
Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Simple Caprese Skewers
recipes.summary: Mini skewers with mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Thread tomato, mozzarella, and basil on skewers.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze.

recipes.title: Spinach and Strawberry Wrap
recipes.summary: Whole wheat wrap filled with spinach, strawberries, and goat cheese.
steps: Layer spinach, strawberries, and goat cheese on the tortilla.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and roll up.

recipes.title: Baked Potato Wedges
recipes.summary: Crispy baked potato wedges seasoned with paprika.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potato wedges with oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until crispy.

recipes.title: Avocado Tuna Salad
recipes.summary: Tuna salad mixed with avocado for a creamy, healthy twist.
steps: Mix all ingredients together.
Serve as a salad or on whole grain bread.

recipes.title: Roasted Garlic Green Beans
recipes.summary: Fresh green beans roasted with garlic and olive oil.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss green beans with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 15-20 minutes.

recipes.title: Peach Smoothie
recipes.summary: A refreshing smoothie with peaches and yogurt.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Turkey Spinach Wrap
recipes.summary: Whole wheat wrap with turkey, spinach, and mustard.
steps: Spread mustard on the tortilla.
Add turkey and spinach.
Roll up and slice.

recipes.title: Mixed Berry Fruit Salad
recipes.summary: A mix of fresh strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries.
steps: Combine berries in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and honey if desired.
